pr_title: Avoids the concern about enqueue causing clear to be called

timeline.bodyText:
I believe this code should be moved to clearImpl() as well.  Otherwise, we could just null the field directly.
Note, clearImpl() can be mad synchronized as its the method that needs to keep the referent and state consistent
timeline.author: DanHeidinga

timeline.message:
Avoids the concern about enqueue causing clear to be called

	new private method clearImpl for setting the referent to null.
	clearImpl() is called from clear() and enqueue()

Signed-off-by: Lin Hu <linhu@ca.ibm.com>
